main.name: Elias Weinraub
main.description: I am a frontend engineer, working primarily with React and Javsacript to develop beautiful web apps
main.bio: Born and raised in Brooklyn, NY. Entirely self-taught developer. After 2 years at the CBS Evening News, I left NY to spend a few years working in Spain. Freshly back in the US of A, and looking for my next opportunity.
